code: import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Card(_ref){var blog=_ref.blog;function scrollToTop(){window.scrollTo({top:0,behavior:"smooth"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/blog/".concat(blog.category,"/").concat(blog.blog_id),className:"grow",onClick:scrollToTop,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",style:{width:'18rem'},"data-aos":"fade",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:blog.img,className:"card-img-top",alt:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"topic-banner ".concat(blog.topic)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card-title",children:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text text-link-3",children:blog.text&&(blog.text.length<250?blog.text:blog.text.slice(0,250)+"...")})]})]})},blog.blog_id);}
